body:
To include into existing Jenkins, use this bash snipped as an example

```bash
# set +x

EXTERNAL_REPO=$1
EXTERNAL_PR=${2:-22}
CMS_SW_TAG=$3
WORKSPACE="/build/zmatonis/jenkins_sources_flag"

if [[ "X$EXTERNAL_REPO" != "X"  && "$EXTERNAL_REPO" != 'cms-sw/cmsdist'  && "X$EXTERNAL_PR" != "X" && "X$CMS_SW_TAG" != "X" ]] ; then
    echo "Testing pull reguest"
    PKG_NAME=$(echo $EXTERNAL_REPO | sed 's|.*/||')
    pushd $WORKSPACE
        ./cms-bot/get_source_flag_for_cmsbuild.sh $EXTERNAL_REPO $EXTERNAL_PR $CMS_SW_TAG
        EXTRA_CMSBUILD_ARGS="$(cat get_source_flag_result.txt)"
    popd
else
    echo "Not testig external"
    exit 1
fi
echo $EXTRA_CMSBUILD_ARGS
```
